00045 CGDACSequenceItemWriter::CGDACSequenceItemWriter()

00048   m_HitNeedsRedoing = false;

00052 CGDACSequenceItemWriter::~CGDACSequenceItemWriter()
00053 {
00054         m_Hits.erase(m_Hits.begin(), m_Hits.end());
00055         m_HitList.erase(m_HitList.begin(), m_HitList.end());

00059 CGDACSequenceItemWriter CGDACSequenceItemWriter::copyMe()
00060 {
00061   CGDACSequenceItemWriter copy = CGDACSequenceItemWriter();
00062   // copy over relevant items
00063   copy.m_GroupName = m_GroupName;
00064   copy.m_SeqVersion = m_SeqVersion;
00065   copy.m_Parameters = m_Parameters;
00066   return(copy);
00067 }

00091 bool CBPMAPFileWriter::TpmapExists()
00092 {
00093         // Find the file stats.
00094         struct stat st;
00095         return (stat(m_TpmapFileName.c_str(), &st) == 0);
00096 }

00099 int tokenize(const std::string& lineBuffer, std::list<std::string>& tokens){
00100   // gets tokens  delimited by white space from lineBuffer into a list of tokens
00101   // returns the number of tokens found
00102   std::string token;
00103   std::stringstream ss(lineBuffer);
00104 
00105   tokens.clear();
00106   while (ss >> token)
00107     tokens.push_back(token);
00108 
00109   return( (int)tokens.size());
00110 }
00111 
00113 int CGDACSequenceItemWriter::operator<(const CGDACSequenceItemWriter &rhs) const
00114 {
00115   // sort on m_GroupName, then on m_SeqVersion, then on m_Name
00116    if( this->m_GroupName == rhs.m_GroupName && this->m_SeqVersion == rhs.m_SeqVersion && this->m_Name < rhs.m_Name) return 1;
00117    if( this->m_GroupName == rhs.m_GroupName && this->m_SeqVersion < rhs.m_SeqVersion) return 1;
00118    if( this->m_GroupName < rhs.m_GroupName ) return 1;
00119    return 0;
00120 }

00123 bool CGDACSequenceItemWriter::processGroupName(const std::string& tag, const std::string& value)
00124 {
00125   if( tag == BPMAP_GROUP_NAME) {
00126     m_GroupName = value;
00127     m_Name = "";
00128     m_SeqVersion = "";
00129     return (true);
00130   }
00131       return(false);
00132 }
00133 
00135 bool CGDACSequenceItemWriter::processVersion(const std::string& tag, const std::string& value)
00136 {
00137   if( tag == BPMAP_VERSION_NAME) { 
00138     m_SeqVersion = value;
00139     return (true);
00140   }
00141       return(false);
00142 }

00145 bool CGDACSequenceItemWriter::processGenericTagValue(const std::string& tag, const std::string& value)
00146 {
00147   TagValuePairType tagValue;
00148   if (tag.length() <=1){
00149     // tag is a singleton # character, not permissible
00150     return( false );
00151   }
00152   std::string nTag = tag.substr(1, tag.length() -1); // strip the leading "#"
00153   tagValue.Tag = nTag;
00154   tagValue.Value = value;
00155   m_Parameters.push_back(tagValue);
00156   return(true);
00157 }
00158 
00160 #define DNA_BASE_A     0
00161 #define DNA_BASE_C     1
00162 #define DNA_BASE_G     2
00163 #define DNA_BASE_T     3
00164 #define DNA_BASE_OTHER 4
00165 
00166 int acgt_to_int(char c, unsigned int *i) {
00167   switch(c) {
00168     case 'a':
00169     case 'A':
00170       *i = DNA_BASE_A;
00171       break;
00172     case 'c':
00173     case 'C':
00174       *i = DNA_BASE_C;
00175       break;
00176     case 'g':
00177     case 'G':
00178       *i = DNA_BASE_G;
00179       break;
00180     case 't':
00181     case 'T':
00182       *i = DNA_BASE_T;
00183       break;
00184     default:
00185       *i = DNA_BASE_OTHER;
00186       break;
00187   }
00188 
00189   if(*i == DNA_BASE_OTHER)
00190     return(EXIT_FAILURE);
00191   else
00192     return(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00193 }
00194 
00196 /*
00197 ** d is a char array, should consist only of [acgtACGT]
00198 ** n_d is the length of d
00199 ** b is the array to which the byte form of the dna will be written
00200 ** n_b is the available number of bytes (so we can check if there is enough space)
00201 */
00202 int dna_to_byte(const std::string& sequence, char *packedSequence) {
00203   unsigned short i,j,k,n_bytes;
00204   unsigned int base;
00205   
00206   int n_d = (int)sequence.length();
00207 
00208   /* Number of bytes required - we pack 4 bases per byte */
00209   n_bytes = (unsigned short) ceil(n_d/(float)4);
00210 
00211   for(i=0,j=0; i<PROBE_STORAGE_BUFFER_LENGTH; i++) {
00212     for(k=0; (k<4 && j<n_d); k++, j++) {
00213       if(acgt_to_int(sequence[j],&base)==EXIT_FAILURE)
00214         return(0);
00215       else {
00216         packedSequence[i] = ((packedSequence[i] << 2) | base);
00217         /* printf("dna_to_byte: writing base %c as %d, b[%d] is now %u\n",d[j],base,i,(unsigned char) b[i]); */
00218       }
00219     }
00220     /* the last byte may not be filled, in which case pad with zeros (effectively pads with 'A') */
00221     if(k < 4)
00222       packedSequence[i] = packedSequence[i] << 2*(4-k);
00223     /* printf("dna_to_byte: b[%d]=%u\n",i,(unsigned char)b[i]); */
00224   }
00225 
00226   return(n_d);
00227 }

00229 
00231 bool CGDACSequenceItemWriter::processHitItem(std::list<std::string>& tokens)
00232 {
00233   unsigned int val;
00234   float fval;
00235 
00236   GDACSequenceHitItemType hit;
00237   if (!(6 <= (int)tokens.size()) && ((int)tokens.size() <= 9)){
00238     return( false );
00239   }
00240   std::string sequence = tokens.front(); tokens.pop_front();
00241   std::string strand = tokens.front(); tokens.pop_front();
00242   std::string seqName = tokens.front(); tokens.pop_front();
00243   std::string hitPosition = tokens.front(); tokens.pop_front();
00244   std::string pmX = tokens.front(); tokens.pop_front();
00245   std::string pmY = tokens.front(); tokens.pop_front();
00246   std::string mmX;
00247   std::string mmY;
00248   // no match score in current TPMAPS
00249   std::string matchScore = "1.0";
00250   // in the future a match score can be tacked onto the end of the line
00251   if (tokens.size() == 1) {
00252     matchScore = tokens.front(); tokens.pop_front();
00253   }
00254 
00255   // check the seqName for consistency
00256   if (m_Name.size() == 0 ) m_Name = seqName;
00257   if (m_Name != seqName) { // this SequenceItemWriter instance is finished
00258     m_HitNeedsRedoing = true;
00259     return(true);
00260   }
00261   
00262   if (m_ProbePairsValue < 0) { // initialize
00263     if (tokens.size() >= 2) { // PM and MM present
00264       m_ProbePairsValue = PM_MM;
00265     } else { // PM only present
00266       m_ProbePairsValue = PM_ONLY;
00267     }
00268   } else { // test for consistency presence or absence of mismatch
00269     if ((m_ProbePairsValue == PM_MM) && (tokens.size() < 2)){
00270       m_strError = "Too few tokens to process MM probes in PM/MM line";
00271       return (false);
00272     }
00273     if ((m_ProbePairsValue == PM_ONLY) && (tokens.size() >= 2)){
00274       m_strError = "Too many tokens left to process in PMOnly line";
00275       return (false);
00276     }
00277   }
00278   if(m_ProbePairsValue == PM_MM){
00279     mmX = tokens.front(); tokens.pop_front();
00280     mmY = tokens.front(); tokens.pop_front();
00281   }
00282 
00283   if (tokens.size() == 1) {
00284     matchScore = tokens.front(); tokens.pop_front();
00285   }
00286 
00287   // 1. process the sequence
00288   memset(&hit.PackedPMProbe[0], 0, PROBE_STORAGE_BUFFER_LENGTH+1);
00289   char *packedSequence = &hit.PackedPMProbe[0];
00290   int len = dna_to_byte(sequence, packedSequence);
00291   if (len == 0){
00292     m_strError = "failed to pack sequence token: " + sequence;
00293     return(false);
00294   }
00295 
00296   // 2. process the probe length
00297   hit.ProbeLength = (int)sequence.size();
00298 
00299   // 3. process the strand
00300   const char ch = strand[0];
00301   if (strand.size() != 1){
00302     m_strError = "Unrecognized strand token: " + strand;
00303     return(false);
00304   }
00305   switch(ch) {
00306   case 't':
00307   case 'T':
00308   case '1':
00309   case '+':
00310     hit.TopStrand = 1;
00311     break;
00312   case 'f':
00313   case 'F':
00314   case '0':
00315   case '-':
00316     hit.TopStrand = 0;
00317     break;
00318   default:
00319     m_strError = "Unrecognized strand token: " + strand;
00320     return( false );
00321   }
00322   
00323   // 4. process the hitPosition
00324   if( sscanf(hitPosition.c_str(), "%u", &val) == EOF){ //error
00325     m_strError = "Unrecognized hitPosition: " + hitPosition;
00326     return(false);
00327   }
00328   hit.Position = val;
00329 
00330   // 5. process the PM X position
00331   if( sscanf(pmX.c_str(), "%u", &val) == EOF){ //error
00332     m_strError = "Unrecognized PM X: " + pmX;
00333     return(false);
00334   }
00335   hit.PMX = val;
00336 
00337   // 6. process the PM Y position
00338   if( sscanf(pmY.c_str(), "%u", &val) == EOF){ //error
00339     m_strError = "Unrecognized PM Y: " + pmY;
00340     return(false);
00341   }
00342   hit.PMY = val;
00343 
00344   // 7. process the match score
00345   if( sscanf(matchScore.c_str(), "%f", &fval) == EOF){ //error
00346     m_strError = "Unrecognized Match Score: " + matchScore;
00347     return(false);
00348   }
00349   hit.MatchScore = fval;
00350   if ( !( (0.0 <= hit.MatchScore) && (hit.MatchScore <= 1.0)) ) { //error
00351     m_strError = "Match Score must be at least 0.0 and no greater than 1.0: " + matchScore;
00352     return (false);
00353   }
00354 
00355   if ( m_ProbePairsValue == PM_MM ){
00356     // 8. process the MM X position
00357     if( sscanf(mmX.c_str(), "%u", &val) == EOF){ //error
00358       m_strError = "Unrecognized MM X: " + mmX;
00359       return(false);
00360     }
00361     hit.MMX = val;
00362   
00363     // 9. process the PM Y position
00364     if( sscanf(mmY.c_str(), "%u", &val) == EOF){ //error
00365     m_strError = "Unrecognized MM Y: " + mmY;
00366       return(false);
00367     }
00368     hit.MMY = val;
00369   }
00370     
00371   m_HitList.push_front(hit);
00372 
00373   return(true);
00374 }
00375 
00377 
00378 bool CBPMAPFileWriter::ReadTpmap()
00379 {
00380         // pseudo code
00381         // Make a GDACSequenceItem
00382         // Read in the first line
00383         // expect a format:
00384         // #group_name\tString
00385         // Read in second line
00386         // expect format:
00387         // #version\tString
00388         // other parameters have the form:
00389         // #name\tString
00390         // and must occur after the #version line.
00391         // Read in subsequent lines: Sequence\tStrand\tName\tPos\tX\tY\tX\tY
00392         // and make a GDACSequenceHitItemType and add to the array within
00393         // the GDACSequenceItem until we see the next
00394         // #group_name\tString
00395         // or EOF
00396 
00397         // sort by Group Name then by Version then by Name
00398         // within each set sort by position and then by strand
00399 
00400         m_ReadSucceeded = false;
00401 
00402         bool processingHitItems = true; //enter the while loop looking for a groupName tag
00403         // bool processingGenericTagValues = false; // unused
00404         bool processingTagValues = false;
00405         bool processingGroupName = true;
00406         bool processingVersion = true;
00407 
00408         std::string tag;
00409         std::string value;
00410 
00411         std::string lineBuffer;
00412         std::string token;
00413         
00414 
00415         m_strError = "";
00416         std::ifstream tpMapFileStr;
00417         bool use_cin = (m_TpmapFileName.size() == 0);
00418         if(!use_cin) { // Open the file if set
00419           tpMapFileStr.open(m_TpmapFileName.c_str(), std::ios::in);
00420           if (!tpMapFileStr)
00421             {
00422               m_strError = "Unable to open " + m_TpmapFileName;
00423               return( false );
00424             }
00425         }
00426         try {
00427           while (1)
00428           {
00429                   if (use_cin)
00430                   {
00431                           if (!getline(std::cin, lineBuffer))
00432                                   break;
00433                   }
00434                   else
00435                   {
00436                           if (!getline(tpMapFileStr, lineBuffer))
00437                                   break;
00438                   }
00439 
00440               std::list<std::string> tokens;
00441               int ntokens = tokenize(lineBuffer, tokens);
00442               if (ntokens == 0) continue;  // ignore lines with 0 tokens
00443               // ignore lines beginning with "#" followed by any white space
00444               if (tokens.
00445                   front() == BPMAP_TAG_VALUE_START) continue;
00446 
00447               // set up the logic to process the line
00448               if (lineBuffer.substr(0,1) == BPMAP_TAG_VALUE_START){ // tag is present
00449                 tag = tokens.front();
00450                 tokens.pop_front();
00451                 std::transform(tag.begin(), tag.end(), tag.begin(), tolower);
00452                 if (ntokens == 1) {  // tag is present with no value
00453                   value = "";
00454                 }
00455                 else {
00456                   value = tokens.front();
00457                 }
00458 
00459                 bool tagDone = false;
00460                 if (tag == BPMAP_GROUP_NAME) {
00461                   if (processingHitItems) {
00462                     // should have just finished a block of probes (unless first time through)
00463                     processingGroupName = true;
00464                     processingVersion = false;
00465                     processingTagValues = false;
00466                     processingHitItems = false;
00467 
00468                     tagDone = true;
00469                   }
00470                   else { //error
00471                     m_strError = "Saw #group_name tag not at beginning of file or not after a set of probes in " + m_TpmapFileName;
00472                     return(false);
00473                   }             
00474                 }
00475                 if (tag == BPMAP_VERSION_NAME){
00476                   // should have just processed the #seq_group_name tag
00477                   if (processingGroupName) {
00478                     processingVersion = true;
00479                     processingGroupName = false;
00480                     processingTagValues = false;
00481                     processingHitItems = false;
00482                   
00483                     tagDone = true;
00484                   }
00485                   else { // error out
00486                     m_strError = "Saw #version tag not following #group_name tag in " + m_TpmapFileName;
00487                     return(false);
00488                   }
00489                 }
00490               
00491                 if (!tagDone) {
00492                   //should have previously processed the #version tag
00493                   if (processingVersion) {
00494                     processingTagValues = true;
00495                     processingGroupName = false;
00496                     processingHitItems = false;
00497                   }
00498                   else { //error out
00499                     m_strError = "Saw a generic tag in line not following #version tag in " + m_TpmapFileName + ": " + lineBuffer;
00500                     return(false);        
00501                   }
00502                 }
00503               }
00504               else {  // no tag was present, must be processing probe hit items
00505                 processingHitItems = true;
00506                 processingTagValues = false;
00507                 processingGroupName = false;
00508                 processingVersion = false;
00509               }
00510 
00511               if ( !(processingHitItems || processingTagValues ||
00512                      processingGroupName || processingVersion) ) {
00513                 // error out
00514                 m_strError = "Invalid input line: " + lineBuffer + " in "  + m_TpmapFileName;
00515                 return(false);
00516               }
00517             
00518               if (processingGroupName) {
00519                 // make a new GDACSequenceItem
00520                 m_SequenceItemList.push_front(CGDACSequenceItemWriter());
00521                 if (!m_SequenceItemList.front().processGroupName(tag, value)) {
00522                   m_strError = "Expected to see #group_name, saw: " + lineBuffer + " in " + m_TpmapFileName;
00523                   return( false );
00524                 }
00525                 continue;
00526               }
00527                 
00528               if (processingVersion && !processingTagValues) {
00529                 if (!m_SequenceItemList.front().processVersion(tag, value)) {
00530                   m_strError = "Expected to see #version, saw: " + lineBuffer + " in " + m_TpmapFileName;
00531                   return( false );
00532                 }
00533                 continue;
00534               }
00535 
00536               if (processingTagValues) { // processing tag/value pairs
00537                 if (!m_SequenceItemList.front().processGenericTagValue(tag, value)) {
00538                   m_strError = "Expected #tag/value pair, saw: " + lineBuffer + " in " + m_TpmapFileName;
00539                   return( false );
00540                 }
00541                 continue;
00542               }
00543 
00544               if (processingHitItems) {
00545                 if (!m_SequenceItemList.front().processHitItem(tokens)){
00546                   m_strError = "Error processing sequence hit, line: " + lineBuffer + " in " + m_TpmapFileName + "\n" + m_SequenceItemList.front().GetError();
00547                   return( false );
00548                 }
00549                 if( m_SequenceItemList.front().m_HitNeedsRedoing ){
00550                   // test to see whether this m_SequenceItemList.front() should be finished
00551                   // this covers the case when a new SeqName needs to be created with
00552                   // an ongoing Group Name and Version
00553                   // make a new CGDACSequenceItemWriter
00554                   ntokens = tokenize(lineBuffer, tokens); // remake the token list
00555                   m_SequenceItemList.push_front(m_SequenceItemList.front().copyMe());
00556                   if (!m_SequenceItemList.front().processHitItem(tokens)){ //retry
00557                     m_strError = "Error processing sequence hit, line: " + lineBuffer + " in " + m_TpmapFileName + "\n" + m_SequenceItemList.front().GetError();
00558                     return( false );
00559                   }
00560                 }
00561                 continue;
00562               }
00563 
00564             } //end while
00565 
00566           // now everything is in memory and we do the big sort
00567           m_SequenceItemList.sort();
00568 
00569           std::list<CGDACSequenceItemWriter>::iterator i;
00570           for(i=m_SequenceItemList.begin(); i != m_SequenceItemList.end(); ++i) {
00571             (*i).m_HitList.sort();
00572           }
00573         
00574           m_ReadSucceeded = true;
00575           return( true );
00576         }
00577         catch (std::string exceptionString) {
00578           m_strError = "Exception: " + exceptionString + " raised while reading input";
00579           tpMapFileStr.close();
00580         }
00581         return( false );
00582 }
00583 
00584 bool CBPMAPFileWriter::WriteBpmap()
00585 {
00586         // write the BPMAP file header
00587         // iterate through all the GDACSequenceItem
00588         // write each Sequence Description
00589         // iterate through all the GDACSequenceItem and then GDACSequenceItemHitType
00590         // write position information until the Group name/Version changes
00591 
00592         // no BPMAP footer
00593 
00594         if(!m_ReadSucceeded) {
00595           m_strError = "No data to write.";
00596           return ( false );
00597         }
00598 
00599         std::ofstream of;
00600         of.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::out | std::ios::binary);
00601 
00602         // check if open
00603         if(!of) {
00604           m_strError = "Unable to open file " + m_FileName + " for output.";
00605           return ( false );
00606         }
00607         
00608         try {
00609           // This file is written in network (big-endian) format
00610           // Version is 3.0
00611           // Write File Header (Section 1)
00612           std::string magic = BPMAP_FILE_HEADER_BYTES;
00613           WriteFixedString(of, magic, BPMAP_FILE_HEADER_LEN); // 1.1
00614           WriteFloat_N(of, m_Version);                        // 1.2
00615           WriteUInt32_N(of, (uint32_t)m_SequenceItemList.size());       // 1.3
00616 
00617           // Write blocks of Sequence description (Section 2)
00618           unsigned int offsetPlaceHolder = 0;
00619           std::list<CGDACSequenceItemWriter>::iterator i;
00620           for(i=m_SequenceItemList.begin(); i != m_SequenceItemList.end(); ++i) {
00621             WriteString_N(of, (*i).m_Name);           // 2.1, 2.2
00622             WriteUInt32_N(of, (*i).m_ProbePairsValue);// 2.3
00623             (*i).m_offsetPosition = of.tellp();
00624             WriteUInt32_N(of, offsetPlaceHolder);     // 2.4
00625             WriteUInt32_N(of, (uint32_t)(*i).m_HitList.size()); // 2.5
00626             WriteString_N(of, (*i).m_GroupName);      // 2.6, 2.7
00627             WriteString_N(of, (*i).m_SeqVersion);     // 2.8, 2.9
00628             WriteUInt32_N(of, (uint32_t)(*i).m_Parameters.size());// 2.10
00629             TagValuePairTypeVector::iterator j;
00630             for(j=(*i).m_Parameters.begin(); j != (*i).m_Parameters.end(); ++j) {
00631               WriteString_N(of, (*j).Tag);            // 2.10.1, 2.10.2
00632               WriteString_N(of, (*j).Value);          // 2.10.3, 2.10.4
00633             }
00634           }
00635           // Write blocks of Probe-sequence mappings (Section 3)
00636           unsigned int sequenceIndex = 0;
00637           for(i=m_SequenceItemList.begin(); i != m_SequenceItemList.end(); ++i) {
00638             (*i).m_HitStartPosition = of.tellp();
00639 
00640             WriteUInt32_N(of, sequenceIndex);    // 3.1.1 SequenceID (really index)
00641             sequenceIndex++;
00642                   
00643             std::list<GDACSequenceHitItemType>::iterator j;
00644             for(j=(*i).m_HitList.begin(); j != (*i).m_HitList.end(); ++j) {       
00645               WriteUInt32_N(of, (*j).PMX);       // 3.2.1
00646               WriteUInt32_N(of, (*j).PMY);       // 3.2.2
00647               if((*i).m_ProbePairsValue == PM_MM){   
00648                 WriteUInt32_N(of, (*j).MMX);     // 3.2.3
00649                 WriteUInt32_N(of, (*j).MMY);     // 3.2.4
00650               }
00651               WriteUInt8(of, (*j).ProbeLength);  // 3.2.5
00652               WriteCharacterArray(of, (*j).PackedPMProbe, PROBE_STORAGE_BUFFER_LENGTH); // 3.2.6
00653               WriteFloat_N(of, (*j).MatchScore); // 3.2.7
00654               WriteUInt32_N(of, (*j).Position);  // 3.2.8
00655               WriteUInt8(of, (*j).TopStrand);    // 3.2.9
00656             }
00657           }
00658           // Write offsets into file
00659           for(i=m_SequenceItemList.begin(); i != m_SequenceItemList.end(); ++i) {
00660             of.seekp((*i).m_offsetPosition);
00661             WriteUInt32_N(of, (*i).m_HitStartPosition);   // 2.4 fixup
00662           }
00663           of.close();
00664           return( true );
00665         }
00666         catch (std::string exceptionString) {
00667           m_strError = "Exception: " + exceptionString + " raised while writing output file " + m_FileName;
00668           of.close();
00669         }
00670         return( false );
00671 }
